query:
UPDATE trips t
SET
    trip_position_haul_weight_distribution_status = $1
FROM
    (
        SELECT DISTINCT
            ti.trip_id
        FROM
            vessel_events v
            INNER JOIN trips ti ON v.trip_id = ti.trip_id
        WHERE
            v.vessel_event_id = ANY ($2)
    ) q
WHERE
    t.trip_id = q.trip_id
